	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="documentationgetting_started">
					Getting Started
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			

			<p>Welcome to our API.</p>

This API document is designed for those interested in developing for our platform.

This API is still under development and will evolve.

You’ll succeed if you do this.

Here’s some useful information.

Something may not happen if you try and do this.

Something bad will happen if you do this.

		</section>

		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="documentationauthentication">
					Authentication
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			

			<p>You need to be authenticated for all API requests. You can generate an API key in your developer dashboard.</p>

Add the API key to all requests as a GET parameter.

Nothing will work unless you include this API key

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="jQuery" class="language-javascript highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"http://api.myapp.com/books/"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="s2">"token"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"YOUR_APP_KEY"</span><span class="p">},</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>   <span class="nx">alert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="p">});</span> </code></pre>

</div>

curl http://api.myapp.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY

			</section>
		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="documentationerrors">
					Errors
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			

			<table>
Code Name Description 200 OK Success 201 Created Creation Successful 400 Bad Request We could not process that action 403 Forbidden We couldn’t authenticate you

</table>

All errors will return JSON in the following format:

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "error message here"
}

		</section>

		
	</section>




	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="apibooks_list">
					/books
					
						<span class="endpoint get"></span>
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			
				<p class="description">List all books</p>
			

			<h6>Parameters</h6><dl>
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of books returned

</dl>

This call will return a maximum of 100 books

Lists all the photos you have access to. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.myapp.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
  if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
    console.log(body);
  }
});

curl http://sampleapi.readme.com/orders?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="Response" class="language-json highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"The Hunger Games"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"score"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">4.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"dateAdded"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"12/12/2013"</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"The Hunger Games"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"score"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">4.7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="nt">"dateAdded"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"15/12/2013"</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w"> </span></code></pre>

</div>

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset"
}

			</section>
		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="apibooks_add">
					/books
					
						<span class="endpoint post"></span>
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			
				<p class="description">Create Book</p>
			

			<h6>Parameters</h6><dl>
title
The title for the book
score
The book’s score between 0 and 5

</dl>

The book will automatically be added to your reading list

Adds a book to your collection.

$.post("http://api.myapp.com/books/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "title": "The Book Thief",
  "score": 4.3
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="Response" class="language-json highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"The Book Thief"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"score"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">4.3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"dateAdded"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"5/1/2015"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w"> </span></code></pre>

</div>

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}

			</section>
		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="apibooks_get">
					/books/:id
					
						<span class="endpoint get"></span>
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			
				<p class="description">Get Book</p>
			

			<p>Returns a specific book from your collection</p>

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="Response" class="language-json highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"The Book Thief"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"score"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">4.3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"dateAdded"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"5/1/2015"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w"> </span></code></pre>

</div>

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

			</section>
		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="apibooks_update">
					/books/:id
					
						<span class="endpoint put"></span>
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			
				<p class="description">Update Book</p>
			

			<h6>Parameters</h6><dl>
title
The title for the book
score
The book’s score between 0 and 5

</dl>

Update an existing book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/books/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "score": 5.0,
    "title": "The Book Stealer"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="Response" class="language-json highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"The Book Stealer"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"score"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"dateAdded"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"5/1/2015"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w"> </span></code></pre>

</div>

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

			</section>
		
	</section>

	<section class="doc-content">
		<section class="left-docs">
			<h3>
				<a id="apibooks_delete">
					/books/:id
					
						<span class="endpoint delete"></span>
					
				</a>
			</h3>
			
				<p class="description">Deletes a book</p>
			

			<p>Deletes a book in your collection.</p>

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/books/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

		</section>

		
			<section class="right-code">
				<div title="Response" class="language-json highlighter-rouge"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">   </span><span class="nt">"status"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"deleted"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w"> </span></code></pre>

</div>

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

			</section>
		
	</section>
